pages.text: $(li)Cats are passive animals that can be found in $(l:patchouli:villagers/villagers)Villages$(/l), $(l:patchouli:structures/witch_house)Witch Hut$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:structures/maple_witch_house)Maple Witch Hut$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Cat will sprint away from you.$(br)$(li)To tamed it except you have to hold a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_cod)Raw Cod$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_salmon)Raw Salmon$(/l), wait until the Cat approach you and give it the fish.

$(li)Repeat this process a couple of times until it stops running away from you.$(br)$(li)Tamed Cats will follow you and they can be ordered sit right clicking on them.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/creeper)Creepers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/phantom)Phantoms$(/l) will run away from Cats too.
